languages.text: {n}Союзники культа среди моторных вандалов услышали голос выводка, зовущий на помощь, но мало кто пришел на выручку — заранее предупрежденные лояльные вожди вероломно перебили большинство из тех, кто собрался в рейд на ульи.{/n}

{n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Союзники культа среди моторных вандалов услышали голос выводка, зовущий на помощь, но мало кто пришел на выручку — заранее предупрежденные лояльные вожди вероломно перебили большинство из тех, кто собрался в рейд на ульи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Engine Vandals allies of the cult had heard the voice of the brood asking for help, but only a few of them could come — the loyal leaders, warned in advance, have treacherously killed most of those planning to raid the hives.{/n}

{n}The Engine Vandals allies of the cult had heard the voice of the brood asking for help, but only a few of them could come — the loyal leaders, warned in advance, have treacherously killed most of those planning to raid the hives.{/n}

{n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals had heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, but only a few of them could come — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader were warned in advance and have treacherously killed most of those planning to raid the hives.{/n}

{n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

{n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

languages.text: {n}引擎破坏者之中的邪教盟友听到了虫群求助的声音，但最终只有极少数人前来支援。那些忠于行商浪人的引擎破坏者领袖事先得到了警告，他们临阵倒戈，消灭了绝大部分打算袭击巢都的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}引擎破坏者之中的邪教盟友听到了虫群求助的声音，但最终只有极少数人前来支援。那些忠于行商浪人的引擎破坏者领袖事先得到了警告，他们临阵倒戈，消灭了绝大部分打算袭击巢都的人。{/n}
{n}引擎破坏者之中的邪教盟友听到了虫群求助的声音，但最终只有少数人准时赶到战场。那些忠于行商浪人的引擎破坏者领袖事先得到了警告，他们临阵倒戈，消灭了绝大部分打算袭击巢都的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los aliados del culto entre los Vándalos del Motor habían oído la voz de la progenie suplicando ayuda, pero muy pocos acudieron: los líderes aún leales {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente recibieron la advertencia y mataron a traición a la mayoría de quienes planeaban asaltar las colmenas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los aliados del culto entre los Vándalos del Motor habían oído la voz de la progenie suplicando ayuda, pero muy pocos acudieron: los líderes aún leales {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente recibieron la advertencia y mataron a traición a la mayoría de quienes planeaban asaltar las colmenas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エンジン破壊者の魔女団の一派は、助けを求める個体群の声を聞いていたが、助けに行けたのはごくわずかだった...ローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓っているリーダーたちは、事前に警告を受け、ハイヴ襲撃を計画していた者たちを裏切ってそのほとんどを殺害したのだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エンジン破壊者の魔女団の一派は、助けを求める個体群の声を聞いていたが、助けに行けたのはごくわずかだった...ローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓っているリーダーたちは、事前に警告を受け、ハイヴ襲撃を計画していた者たちを裏切ってそのほとんどを殺害したのだった。{/n}
{n}エンジン破壊者の魔女団の一派は、助けを求める個体群の声を聞いていたが、助けに行けたのはごくわずかだった...ローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓っているリーダーたちは、事前に警告を受け、ハイヴ襲撃を計画していた者たちを裏切ってそのほとんどを殺害したのだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si les Vandales mécaniques fidèles au culte ont entendu la voix du couvain appeler à l'aide, mais seule une poignée d'entre eux parvient à répondre à l'appel. Prévenus par leurs alliés, les chefs toujours fidèles {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} ont sournoisement éliminé la plupart de ceux qui comptaient attaquer les ruches.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si les Vandales mécaniques fidèles au culte ont entendu la voix du couvain appeler à l'aide, mais seule une poignée d'entre eux parvient à répondre à l'appel. Prévenus par leurs alliés, les chefs toujours fidèles {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} ont sournoisement éliminé la plupart de ceux qui comptaient attaquer les ruches.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Verbündeten des Kultes unter den Maschinenvandalen haben die Hilferufe der Brut gehört, aber nur wenige reagierten darauf ... die Anführer, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} noch treu ergeben waren, waren im Vorfeld gewarnt worden und hatten die meisten Ketzer bereits getötet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Verbündeten des Kultes unter den Maschinenvandalen haben die Hilferufe der Brut gehört, aber nur wenige reagierten darauf ... die Anführer, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} noch treu ergeben waren, waren im Vorfeld gewarnt worden und hatten die meisten Ketzer bereits getötet.{/n}

{n}Die Verbündeten des Kults unter den Maschinenvandalen hatten die Hilferufe der Rotte gehört, doch nur wenige konnten ihnen folgen — die Anführer, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} noch treu ergeben waren, waren im Voraus gewarnt worden und hatten die meisten Ketzer bereits getötet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Makine Vandalları arasında yer alan tarikat müttefikleri, sürünün yardım için yakaran sesini duydular. Ancak cevap verenlerin sayısı bir avcu aşmadı. Hür Tacir'e sadakatlerini koruyan liderler, önceden uyarılarak kovanlara baskın düzenlemeyi düşünenlerin pek çoğunu namertçe öldürdü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The allies of the cult among the Engine Vandals heard the voice of the brood pleading for help, yet very few of them answered — those leaders still loyal to the Rogue Trader had been warned in advance and had treacherously killed most of those intending to raid the hives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Makine Vandalları arasında yer alan tarikat müttefikleri, sürünün yardım için yakaran sesini duydular. Ancak cevap verenlerin sayısı bir avucu aşmadı. Hür Tacir'e sadakatlerini koruyan liderler, önceden uyarılarak kovanlara baskın düzenlemeyi düşünenlerin pek çoğunu namertçe öldürdü.{/n}
